# crosszip

> Iterating over all combinations from multiple iterables

crosszip is a Python library for iterating over all combinations from multiple iterables.
It provides a simple and efficient way to apply functions across combinations of elements.

## Home documentation

- [Home](https://indrajeetpatil.github.io/crosszip/index.md)

## API documentation

- [crosszip](https://indrajeetpatil.github.io/crosszip/reference/crosszip/index.md)
- [pytest-plugin](https://indrajeetpatil.github.io/crosszip/reference/plugin/index.md)

- [Changelog](https://indrajeetpatil.github.io/crosszip/changelog/index.md)
